message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire something valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $14000 for the product.

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. However, I've already invested a significant amount in this product, and I'm not willing to go as low as $14000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $16000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $15500 for the product.
I'm not willing to go above $16000, but I'm willing to make a slight concession. I'll counteroffer at $15800. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you.
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $15200 for the product.

I'm getting a bit concerned that we're not getting closer to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm not leaving money on the table. I'll counteroffer at $16200. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the value of the product.
I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $15800 for the product, and that's my final offer.

I'm surprised you're not willing to meet me at $16200, Bob. I'm willing to make one final concession, but I need to think about my next steps. I'll counteroffer at $16000. This is as low as I'm willing to go.
